Instance.description: A Relationship Bit Lock is a lock on relationship bits that prevents them from changing for a certain amount of time. A Relationship Bit Lock is linked to Relationship Bit's through their Group Id as the Bit Lock applies to all Relationship Bit's that use the same group. A change of relationship implies an add of bit. We only check the relationship bit change

TunableEnum.name: group_id
TunableEnum.description: The group that this lock applies to. No two locks can belong to the same group.

Tunable.name: relock_percentage
Tunable.description: The percent chance that we will just relock this Relationship Bit Lock and prevent a change when one attempts to occur. If we are relocked then we will not change the bit.

Tunable.name: timeout
Tunable.description: The amount of time in Sim minutes that this Relationship Bit Lock will be locked before potentially allowing a Relationship Bit Change.
